alert.note: Alert for Inland Indian River; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 23 at 2:39AM EST until December 25 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM SATURDAY... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31 degrees expected. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 degrees possible. * WHERE...Inland Indian River and Northern Brevard Barrier Islands Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM Saturday. For the Freeze Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Bring pets and potted plants indoors. Check on elderly neighbors to make sure their furnace is working.To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they can be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly.

area.areaDesc: Inland Indian River; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands
